instructions: In iCloud Drive on iCloud.com, tap Select, select the folder or file you want to share, then tap the Add People button . Choose how you want to send the share link: Email: Tap Share Options, edit who can access the files and make changes, then tap Share. In the email window that appears, invite participants by adding their email addresses or phone numbers in the To field. Make any additional edits to the email, then tap Send. The email option is only available when you have iCloud Mail turned on. Copy Link: After you select Copy Link, a text box appears. Add the email addresses or phone numbers of your participants. Tap Share Options, edit who can access the files and make changes, then tap Share. A new window appears with the link for your file. Send the link, for example, using Facebook Messenger.
